value.description: The value of the property at the specified timestamp.

source-type.description: The type or category of the data source.

source-id.description: The identifier of the data source that generated this historical entry.

source-label.description: The label representing the source of the data.

updated-by-user-id.description: The identifier of the user who last updated the property value.

timestamp.description: The timestamp when the property value was last updated.

selected.description: Indicates whether this property is currently selected or not.

is-contact.description: Indicates whether the data is associated with a contact record.

property.description: The specific property whose history is being tracked.

vid.description: The unique identifier for this historical data entry.

canonical-vid.description: The unique identifier for the contact record that this historical data belongs to.

portal-id.description: The identifier for the HubSpot portal that the data belongs to.

source-vids.description: List of unique identifiers of the sources associated with this historical data.
